title: START
body:
-> LIFT [[LIFT]]
-> STILL|GO|NORTH|SOUTH|EAST|WEST [[GO]]
-> LOOK[[LOOK]]
-> HOLD|CARRY [[USE]]
-> SHIT|POOP|FART [[SHIT]]
-> DROP|ONE\s*(?:HAND|ARM|HANDED|ARMED) [[ATTEMPT DROP]]
-> ONE KNEE [[ONE KNEE]]
-> DEFAULT << timeLeft < 10 && isTrapped == false >> [[DEFAULT2]]
-> DEFAULT [[DEFAULT]]
-> STRONGEST ARM|COMPETITION [[STRONGEST ARM]]
-> TIME [[TIME]]
-> JOKE [[JOKE]]
-> BAR|WEIGHT [[BAR]]
-> HELP [[HELP]]
-> DIDNOTHING! << timeLeft < 0 >>[[DID NOTHING]]

title: LIFT
body:
I'll keep trying to $c1LIFT$c0 this thing.
I'm $c1LIFTING$c0 as hard as I can!!
I think I can keep $c1LIFT$c0 this up with your advice!!

-> LIFT << condAction.parent.count > 2 >> [[LIFT GOOD]]
-> THINK|CONTEMPLATE|MEDIDATE [[THINK2]]
-> (?:DISTRACT|THINK|CONTEMPLATE)\s*(?:ABOUT\s*)?(\w+)\b [[THINK]]
-> MEDIDATE\s*(?:ABOUT\s*)?(\w+)\b [[MEDITATE]]
-> GROW(\sa?\s*\w+)? << condAction.parent.count > 2 >> [[GROW]]

title: DEFAULT
body:
Uhh What?
I don't know what you mean
HUH?
I don't $c1THINK$c0 about that stuff
I just gotta keep $c1LIFTING$c0 until I feel like I can do this $c1ONE HANDED$c0!

title: LIFT GOOD
body:
I $c1THINK$c0 I CAN DO ANYTHING IF I TRY HARD ENOUGH!!

-> CAN DO IT|YES|KEEP AT IT|LIFT << condAction.parent.count > 1 >>[[LIFT WILLPOWER]]

title: USE
body: My hands are full $c1LIFTING$c0 this heavy weight to do anything else.

title: GO
body:
I ain't movin from this spot if that's what you're thinking.
Uhh $c1GO$c0? What you want me to $c1GO$c0 somewhere $c1CARRYING$c0 this heavy thing? NO WAY!!

title: LIFT WILLPOWER
body:
I GOT $c1TWO HANDS$c0 ON THE $c1BAR$c0. I CAN DO THIS.
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH
I'M ALREADY $C1LIFTING$c0 AS HARD AS I CAN
**INCOMPREHENSIBLE GRUNTING**
**HEAVY BREATHING**
JUST KEEP $c1LIFTING$c0??!?
$c1LIFT$c0??!? $c1LIFT$c0??!? $c1LIFT$c0??!? $c1LIFT$c0??!? $c1LIFT$c0??!? $c1LIFT$c0??!?

-> LOOK [[LOOK2]]
-> DEFAULT [[DEFAULT2]]
-> LIFT << condAction.parent.count > 6 >>[[RAWPOWER]]
-> (TWO)?\s*(?:HAND|ARM|HANDED|ARMED) [[TWO ARM]]
-> DROP|ONE (?:HAND|ARM|HANDED|ARMED) [[DROP ARM]]
-> GO|NORTH|SOUTH|EAST|WEST [[GO2]]
-> BAR [[FOCUS]]
-> FOCUS [[FOCUS]]
-> TIME [[FOCUS]]
-> JOKE [[JOKE2]]
-> HELP [[HELP2]]

title: THINK
body:
Okay I'll think about $sub << isDistracted = true >>

-> THINK<< isDistracted >>[[ZEN]]

title: LOOK
body: I can see flashing lights in the background. I'm standing in the middle of the stadium. I'm currently $c1LIFTING$c0 this weight for the $c1STRONGEST ARM$c0 compeition.

title: DEFAULT2
body:
REALLY I'M TRYING TO CONCENTRATE HERE
I DON'T KNOW, THIS THING IS HEAVY
WHAT AM I DOING HERE AGIAN? RIGHT THE LIFTING COMPEITION!!
LISTEN I DONT KNOW WHAT YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT
HNNNNGGGG?
UUUUHHH??

title: SHIT
body: How embarassing? I just shit myself. << ENDING('SHIT') >>

title: MEDITATE
body:
Okay I'll meditate about $sub << isDistracted = true >>

-> Medidate<< isDistracted >>[[ZEN]]

title: RAWPOWER
body: RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWW << ENDING('IHAVETHEPOWER') >>

title: ZEN
body:
Not a care in the world << ENDING('ZEN') >>

-> .* [[NOT DESTRACTED]]

title: ATTEMPT DROP
body: No way I'm not loosing this compeitition. I'm going to keep both hands on the $c1BAR$c0 untill I've $c1LIFT$c0 this $c1BAR$c0 high enough!

title: FLYAWAY
body: Freedom at last. << ENDING('FLYAWAY') >>

title: GROW
body:
Grow a WHAT?!? A new limb?

-> GROW WINGS [[FLYAWAY]]
-> GROW ARM|LEG|CHEST|HEAD|TOROSO|HIP|EAR|EYE|BONE|TENDON|TOUNGE|NOSE|TAIL [[MUTANT]]

title: ONE ARM
body: I AM THE $c1STRONGEST ARM$c0!!!! << ENDING('STRONGESTARM') >>

title: DID NOTHING
body: Welp I couldn't hold on any longer. << ENDING('DIDNOTHING') >>

title: DROP ARM
body:
I DID IT, I LET GO OF ONE ARM. ON. THE. $c1BAR$c0. NOW I JUST GOTTA $c1KEEP ONE ARM UP$c0 THIS POSE!. << isTrapped = true >>

-> HOLD|POSE|STAY|STILL << isTrapped == true >>[[ONE ARM]]

title: MUTANT
body: Who knew those extra limbs would come in handy? <<ENDING('EXTRALIMB')>>

title: LOOK2
body: I'M JUST TOO $c1FOCUSED$c0 TO DO ANYTHING ELSE BUT $c1LIFT$c0!!!

title: STRONGEST ARM
body: I stand here to proove my worth in this compitition, I need to do this somehow $c1ONE HANDED$c0, but I feel like I'm loosing power.

title: TIME
body:
I really don't want to think about how long I've got left.
I think my arm is sore. Is this normal? Thats normal right?
How can anyone really do this without thinking about it?
How long do I have to keep $c1LIFTING$c0 for?

title: JOKE
body:
$c1JOKE$c0? Who lost last year's $c1STRONGEST ARM$c0 compeition? A spider!
$c1JOKE$c0? Sure! What do you call a $c1ONE ARMED$c0 bandit? A slot machine!
$c1JOKE$c0? HAH! What has eight legs and no arms? A spider!
$c1JOKE$c0? What can bearly $c1LIFT$c0 weights using thier arms? Weaklings!

title: ONE KNEE
body:
Okay I drop down on $c1ONE KNEE$c0. Thats a bit of a relief! But I don't know for how long.. << giveTime(60); oneKnee = true; >> 

-> ONE KNEE << oneKnee == true >>[[REFUSE]]

title: REFUSE
body: I ain't going down anymore. I feel like that'd crush me. Not the physical me, but my pride!

title: HELP
body: Uhh I called YOU here to $c1HELP$c0 motiviate me to keep this $c1BAR$c0 up! Why are you asking me for $c1HELP$c0?

title: BAR
body: This bar was forged in the great fire. Only during the $c1STRONGEST ARM$c0 compeitition can one ever attempt to $c1CARRY$c0 it.

title: BAR2
body:
I. CAN. BEAT. THISSS! << removeCard('FOCUS') >>
HNNNNGGG
YEAH TAKE THAT
UUUUGHHHHH

title: FOCUS
body:
I CAN FOCUS ON THIS BAR << if( isFocused == false) { giveTime(30); isFocused = true; } >>

-> BAR|FOCUS|TIME << isFocused >>[[BAR2]]

title: HELP2
body: I CAN DO THIS. $c1HELP$c0 ME JUST A LITTLE FURTHER!!

title: GO2
body: I AIN"T GOING ANYWHERE TILL I AM THE CHAMPIONNNN

title: THINK2
body: Think about something? About what?

title: NOT DESTRACTED
body: Whoa what was that about?! << isDistracted = false; removeCard('NOT DESTRACTED'); removeCard('ZEN'); removeCard('ZEN2'); addCard('THINK'); addCard('MEDITATE'); >>

title: TWO ARM
body: I WAS SUPPOST? $c1ARM$c0 WHAT AM I DONG AGAIN? THIS IS SO HEAVY. I DON'T KNOW.

title: JOKE2
body: NO TIME FOR JOKES. I. AM. ALMOST. THERE!!!!!!!!!!!!!
